name: Fishercat 3310
description:
Let's welcome mr. Cat who became the Fishercat to save his house.

Your mission is simple. Catch as many fish as you can. You have 5 days to earn at least 100$.

Controls:

  • arrows - movement
  • space - press buttons, skip screens
  • i - for inventory screen.

Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3
